channel.title: NodeJS on 毛训星的网络日志
channel.description: Recent content in NodeJS on 毛训星的网络日志

item.title: NodeJS Stream from Beginner to Master
item.description: What is a stream Streams are not only found in Nodejs, there are similar concepts in unix operating systems. For example, the pipe operation symbol cat xx.ts | grep 'console.log' can find the corresponding matching content from the file. In fact, the concept of streams in node comes from unix systems, first from Douglas McIlroy’s concept of pipes Initial source。 Wikipedia： Malcolm Douglas McIlroy (born 1932) is a mathematician, engineer, and programmer.
